segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she’s completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so upset when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught before the stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR
